Package pl.put.poznan.processor.rest

Class RESTController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.put.poznan.processor.rest.RESTController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/json")
public class RESTController
extends java.lang.Object
    REST controller for handling JSON processing requests. Provides endpoints for various JSON operations such as minify, prettify, filter, exclude, and compare.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      java.lang.String compare​(java.lang.String json1, java.lang.String json2)
      Compares two JSON strings and identifies differences.
      java.lang.String exclude​(java.lang.String json, java.util.List<java.lang.String> keys)
      Excludes specified keys from the given JSON string.
      java.lang.String filter​(java.lang.String json, java.util.List<java.lang.String> keys)
      Filters the given JSON string to keep only specified keys.
      java.lang.String minify​(java.lang.String json)
      Minifies the given JSON string.

        @PostMapping(value="/minify",
             produces="application/json")
public java.lang.String minify​(@RequestBody
                               java.lang.String json)
        Minifies the given JSON string.
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON string to minify
        Returns:
        the minified JSON string

      • filter

        @PostMapping(value="/filter",
             produces="application/json")
public java.lang.String filter​(@RequestBody
                               java.lang.String json,
                               @RequestParam
                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> keys)
        Filters the given JSON string to keep only specified keys.
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON string to filter
        keys - the list of keys to keep
        Returns:
        the filtered JSON string

      • exclude

        @PostMapping(value="/exclude",
             produces="application/json")
public java.lang.String exclude​(@RequestBody
                                java.lang.String json,
                                @RequestParam
                                java.util.List<java.lang.String> keys)
        Excludes specified keys from the given JSON string.
        Parameters:
        json - the JSON string to process
        keys - the list of keys to exclude
        Returns:
        the JSON string with specified keys excluded

      • compare

        @PostMapping(value="/compare",
             produces="text/plain")
public java.lang.String compare​(@RequestParam
                                java.lang.String json1,
                                @RequestParam
                                java.lang.String json2)
        Compares two JSON strings and identifies differences.
        Parameters:
        json1 - the first JSON string
        json2 - the second JSON string
        Returns:
        a string describing the differences between the two JSONs
